title: James and the giant peach
creator_credit: Walt Disney Productions, Allied Filmmakers, Denise Di Novi, Tim Burton and Henry Selick
brief_description: Based on Roald Dahl’s classic story, your whole family will delight in Disney’s juicy fantasy adventure, a wildly imaginative tale about a young boy who journeys to wondrous New York City to fulfill a dream. This is a magical odyssey soaring with amazing animation and original music. Cast includes Joanna Lumley, Simon Callow, Richard Dreyfuss, Pete Postlethwaite. Jane Leeves, Paul Terry, Miriam Margolyes, Susan Sarandon, David Thewlis.
